code: import React from'react';import{AuthenticationLayout}from'layer7-apihub';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{lightTheme,darkTheme}from'../theme';import{CustomHeader}from'../ui/CustomHeader';import{CustomContent}from'./CustomContent';import{CustomFooter}from'../ui/CustomFooter';export var CustomLayout=function CustomLayout(props){var theme=useSelector(function(state){return state.theme;});return React.createElement(AuthenticationLayout,Object.assign({Header:CustomHeader,Content:CustomContent,Footer:CustomFooter},props,{theme:theme==='light'?lightTheme:darkTheme}));};
